title: Inox Wind bags order for 200 MW wind project in Gujarat, Rajasthan
description: Inox Wind has secured a 200 MW wind energy project order from a renewable C&I power producer, to be executed in Gujarat and Rajasthan. The project includes Inox Windâ€™s latest 3 MW Wind Turbine Generators and turnkey execution, along with multi-year operations and maintenance services. CEO Kailash Tarachandani expressed confidence in significant growth for FY25 and beyond
